ygData.subject: Re: testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well on our server we tried stun, and that doesn t work at all, so I doubt pixie strike would. People just have to face it. Verant really doesn t like the
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Sep 27/99, kim@... wrote:
> From: <kim@...>
>
> I'm curious though what would happen if you had about a dozen
> L50 bards continuously Pixie Striking Nagafen to interrupt his
> spells. :-)
>

Well on our server we tried stun, and that doesn't work at all, so I
doubt pixie strike would. People just have to face it. Verant really
doesn't like the dragons being killed. As soon as anyone figures out a
strategy that allows them to kill it, that strategy will be fixed. They
obviously don't care that you've made a high level and would like to
participate in something big before you finally wander off, bored, as
they probably did the numbers and figured out that most of the rapid
advancers were so excited about the game on release that they signed up
for the 6 month deal, and thus if you leave early they get a free month
out of you right now without you hanging around being a drain on server
resources.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
